title: Divine Diamond Pendant - Modern Haaram Design
materials: conflict-free VVS Clarity Diamonds (brilliant and pear cuts). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: A contemporary interpretation of the traditional Haaram, this pendant features a central floral motif surrounded by meticulously pavé-set diamonds. The design incorporates stylized floral and leaf elements on either side, creating a balanced and elegant aesthetic. The openwork design allows light to penetrate, maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds. Modern geometric and floral pattern
colors: Rose Gold (గులాబీ బంగారం) and White Diamonds (తెల్ల వజ్రాలు)
occasions: or as a sophisticated statement piece for any special occasion. Suited for both formal and semi-formal events.
description: This pendant offers a unique blend of traditional inspiration and contemporary design. The impeccable craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The ethically sourced VVS diamonds provide exceptional sparkle. A versatile piece that can be worn with a variety of necklaces, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The delicate design exudes understated elegance and can elevate any outfit.
